name: libaqbanking
description: A library for online banking and financial applications

hbci.description: Provides support for the German 'Homebanking Computer Interface (HBCI)' online banking protocol

fints.description: Provides support for the FinTS online banking protocol, a successor of HBCI

ofxconnect.description: Provides support for OFX Direct Connect online banking protocol

ebics.description: Provides support for the EBICS, a German banking protocol, successor of the FTAM

paypal.description: Provides support for PayPal's native API
